description: Can't use it, it just hang my shell after install
Warp is the best terminal app, works fine, best performance, and great features. With Warp OhMyZsh and others plugins works better than default terminal app.

First, it requires a login for a terminal emulator, even when trying to sign-in by clicking the button nothing happens.
In his documentation suggests to disable the adblocker. sigh
summary: Requires login for a terminal emulator

description: This is ridiculous. It requires you to login to use it. Worst ever

Does what it says on the tin. More enhanced terminal for linux. If you are at all concerned about using only FOSS, avoiding unnecessary internet connectivity/DRM stuff, or AI features then I don't think this is for you. I believe this is not an open-source project and it does require a login to use because there are paid features, such as the AI assistant. That being said, if you're willing to look past those things this tool seems really useful, particuarly for developers.
Abro el lanzador y se cierra sola
summary: no me funciona ni en fedora o manjaro, se abre y cierra

description: Отличный терминал, который имеет всемипринятные нормы UI. Удобный поиск, копирование и многое другое. Я переезжаю сюда
